text:
Alfred George James Hayes, (8 August 1928 – 21 July 2005) he is English professional wrestler, manager, announcer in wrestling. Best known for his appearances in the United States with the World Wrestling Federation between 1982 and 1995 where he was known as Lord Alfred Hayes.
Honours.
Officer of the Most Order of the British Empire (OBE).

annotations.surface_form: Officer of the Most Order of the British Empire
